children.html:
"Britain's Got Talent" is one of the most popular talent shows on TV and the Internet.
        It often works through the same schema, either staging the ridiculousness of a candidate, or revealing their raw talent to the world. 
        In these videos, we can see the shift between both modes. The candidates first arrive on stage,
        everyone is laughing at them, they are presented as ridiculous. But suddenly, when they start singing, their talent heroically 
        emerges, and the initially "ridiculous" candidate turns into a genius worthy of admiration and fame.

title: Britain's Got Talent, revealing raw jewels since 2007.
